name: Perfect Drops
description: Makes all items drop with perfect rolls.
author: olegbl

config.name: Perfect Blue Items
config.description: Enable to force even blue items to have perfect rolls. Disable to only have perfect unique, set and runeword items.

config.name: Equalize Affix Rarity
config.description: Enable to make higher level affixes appear as frequently as lower level affixes.

config.name: Always +3 to Skill Trees
config.description: Enable to force all affixes that give a bonus to a specific skill tree to always give a bonus of 3 levels.

config.name: Maximum Defense
config.description: Enable to force armor items to spawn with the possible defense.
